subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Pau Gasol had a season-high 36 points and the Los Angeles Lakers clinched the top playoff seed in the Western Conference with a 103-95 victory over the host Nets on Friday night.
snippet: Pau Gasol had a season-high 36 points and the Los Angeles Lakers clinched the top playoff seed in the Western Conference with a 103-95 victory over the host Nets on Friday night.
